Title: Amelia Watson
GameText: Power - Investigation: Reveal and replace the top card of two decks. If those cards share a keyword, draw 3 cards. Otherwise, draw 1 card.

- 2 targets deal each other 1 toxic damage
- 1 Hero may take their PLAY PHASE.
- 1 Hero may take their POWER PHASE.

Title: Bubba
GameText:
Whenever Ame would deal toxic damage, you may discard 1 card to prevent that damage.
END PHASE
Either draw 1 card or this card regains 2 HP.
Quote: "What about the timelines where amelia turned evil without a bubba being present to hold her back? yeah, that happens."

Title: Creative Force of Will
GameText:
POWER PHASE
You may use an additional power this phase.
END PHASE
Discard the top card of 2 decks. If those cards share a keyword, each Hero draws 1 card. Otherwise, draw 1 card.
Quote:
Though fake it seems,            
                               not a dream,                           or a trick of light

Title: Gremlin Screeching
GameText:
Ame deals each non-Hero target 1 irreducible sonic damage. 
Draw 1 card.
You may play 1 card.
If you do, Ame deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 fixed toxic damage.
Quote: "The secret to ame noises? I dig past my cold heart, and grab thoes feelings deep below, i bring them up, and i punch them!"

Title: Ground Pound
GameText:
Ame deals 1 target 3 melee damage. 
Draw 1 card.
You may play 1 card. 
If you do, Ame deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 fixed toxic damage.
Quote: "Nothing beats a ground pound! Just like I did to your mom last night, chat! Hehehehehe!"

Title: Hic!
GameText:
Draw 2 cards.
Reveal the top card of up to 3 decks. Discard any of the revealed cards. Replace the rest.
Discover 1 Item or Ongoing card.
Quote: "Most people don't notice them that much. you guys are the only ones that do, and make, uh, four minute compilations of them."

Title: Industrious Spirit
GameText:
After this card is played, reveal the top 2 cards of 1 deck. Replace them in any order.
POWER: Discover 1 Ongoing card from any deck. If you chose an ally's deck, you may draw 2 cards or play 1 card.
Quote: "Welcome to HoloEN VR Studios! This studio has been built from the ground-pound up to deliver that quality you can't get at home!"

Title: Magnifying Glass
GameText:
After this card is played, salvage 1 One-Shot card.
POWER: Reveal the top 3 cards of 1 deck. Replace them in any order. If you chose an ally's deck, you may draw 2 cards or play 1 card.
Quote: "What can you do with a magnifying glass? Good question, you can burn your enemies with the sun!"

Title: Salty Rage
GameText: REACTION: Ame deals the attacker 3 irreducible toxic damage. Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing or Item card.
Quote: "It was the ping! It was the pingggg! I went through it first!"

Title: Smol Ame
GameText:
START PHASE
Discard the top card of 2 decks. If those cards do not share a keyword, this card deals Ame 2 fixed psychic damage.
END PHASE
Draw 1 card or play 1 card.
Quote: "I think I hurt her feelings. Oh well, not my problem!"
Attribution: -- Smol Ame, Smol Ame Visits the Office, 2021/08/01

Title: Team Player
GameText:
Two Hero characters may each deal 2 projectile damage to the same target.
If that target is destroyed, 1 Hero may play 1 card.

Title: Technical Aptitude
GameText:
Play this card in an ally Hero's's play area.
After a card in this play area is destroyed, that ally Hero may draw 1 card and play 1 card. If they do, destroy this card.
START PHASE
Reveal the top card of that ally Hero's deck. They may play that card. If they do, destroy this card.
Quote: "In the Watson family, when the Wii's not working or something's wrong with the computer, they call Ame in there. 'Ame, fix it!'"

Title: Time Shuffle
GameText:
Bury 1 target with 6 or fewer HP.
Reveal the top card of the associated deck. If it shares a keyword with the buried card, play it.
Otherwise, you may play 1 card.
Quote:
"You gotta go back into the portal, Smol Ame." 
"NOOOOOOOO!"
Attribution: -- Smol Ame, Smol Ame Visits the Office, 2021/08/01

Title: Time Travel Pocket Watch
GameText:
When this card is destroyed, draw 1 card and 1 Hero takes their PLAY PHASE.
POWER: Activate a START PHASE or END PHASE effect. If that effect is on a non-Hero card, each Hero draws 1 card. Otherwise, destroy this card.
Quote: "So, that watch… where'd you get it from?"                      "Uhhh… I gotta go!"                  "She left! Curse you time traveler! Oh well."

Title: Timeline Management
GameText:
Whenever you would draw a card, you may reveal the top card of your deck. Bury or replace that card.
START PHASE
Reveal the top card of 1 deck. If it is a Hero deck, you may bury or replace that card. Otherwise, replace it.
Quote: "Timeline 69 Ame is crazy. She's crazy! That's why we had to start organizing them."
Attribution: -- Smol Ame, Smol Ame Visits the Office, 2021/08/01

Title: Watson Concoction
GameText:
Play this next to a Hero character.
+1 damage dealt by that Hero character.
START PHASE
Either destroy this card or Ame deals that character 2 fixed toxic damage.
Quote: "Don't you trust me chat? It will only hurt a little."
